name: Lucky Kick
description:
"Lucky-Kick" Frisbee-Golf

A top down frisbee-golf game made with PyGame and Python3

Early Access Beta

The game is still in development with bunch of features still on the way, including new tracks.

How to play

To throw the disk, click and drag anywhere on the field and pull away from the disk. Further you pull from the disk, the harder the throw.

You can adjust the angle in which you throw with arrow keys (Left and Right). All throws are modeled as right hand, back hand throws (or left hand fore hand throws), where the disk rotates clockwise.

The disk will tend to fade to the left. The harder the throw, more the disk will fade.

Throwing through tree branches slows the disk, and hitting the trunk will make the disk bounce off or kick off of the trunk.

After each lane, you will a summary of the throws so far. Press space or enter to continue to the next lane.

The Editor Editing and Adding New Tracks and Lanes
